DOC.criteria: Inclusion : 1 . Infants admit NICU Beaumont Children 's Hospital Royal Oak Troy . 2 . Gestational Age 28 0/7 week ( post menstrual age 28 0/7 week ) high 3 . Infants require endotracheal intubation nonemergent basis 4 . Signed informed consent parent Exclusion 1. intubation occur delivery room emergent basis , 2. absence intravenous access 3. abnormality airway 4. know family history neuromuscular disorder 5. renal insufficiency ( urine output < 0.6 mL/kg per hour creatine > 1.7 mg/dL > 1 day age ) 6. know hepatic insufficiency ( abnormal liver function coagulation laboratory result ) 7 . Current diagnosis pulmonary hypertension 8 . Any infant deem attending neonatologist unstable unfit study
